void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,
          U = abs( u+u - R ) / R.y,          // normalized coordinates
          A = abs( U - .5 ),                 // 2 symmetries
          V = U + vec2(-U.y,U);              // 45Â°-tilted coords
    float d =  max(A.x,A.y);                 // distance to square borders
    d =  d > .5             ? 0.             // outside
       : max(V.x,V.y) > .75 ? d              // out diamond
       :        min(V.x,V.y)/2.;             // in diamond
    d = cos(1e2*d);                          // wave pattern
    O = .5 + d/2e2 *R.yyyy;                  // turned to antialiased strips
 // O = vec4 ( d/fwidth(d) );
}
